name: Saigon Sight Seeing and Foodies Tour
description: I will become your motorbike driver, translator, your friend and your tour guide as well. In my tour, you have chance to visit not only famous destinations in Saigon but also  can reach out the local life of Saigon people. You can see Saigon in different sides. Beside plenty of sky buildings in the central, you also see many of slumps next to. You will experience South Vietnam cuisine with street food style and coffee which will become your unfogetable memory about Vietnam.
